title: Full-Time VA Position – Video Content Scraper for E-commerce Ads
job_overview:
We’re an eCommerce brand actively looking for a full-time Virtual Assistant to join us long-term.

Your main mission?
Scrape and organize ready video content from platforms like Amazon, YouTube, Facebook, TikTok, etc. for the products we sell.

We're looking for:
? UGC clips, customer reviews, production-quality videos, unboxings, etc.
? Content that we can reuse for paid advertising (Meta, TikTok, Google Ads)
? Someone who knows what kind of video sells a product

Your responsibilities:
– Daily scraping of video content by product
– Classifying everything clearly into Google Drive folders
– Filtering only usable & valuable assets for direct-response marketing
– Occasionally sourcing international content (multi-language is a plus)

Who we’re looking for:
???? Someone with experience in video content sourcing for eCommerce
???? Or someone who has worked directly/indirectly with video editors for ad creatives
???? Super organized, efficient, and detail-oriented
???? Comfortable working independently and communicating with the creative team

This is a full-time position with long-term potential.
We’re building fast and growing quickly — if you’ve got a good eye for content, this is for you
